description.value: This setting defines the experience when a product is added to cart
This setting defines the breadcrumb display on Product page

This setting defines which dimensions will be displayed as a color, image, or inline text. It applies to all experiences that support dimension selection such as buy box, quick view, search results, and product collection modules.

friendlyName.value: Dimensions to display in product card

description.value: This setting defines which dimensions should be displayed when browsing the products. It applies to product collection and search results modules. It is not recommended to turn it on when the products have lots of dimensions as it may cause some bad user experience as the product cards will be big.
Flag to disable tooltip on items
Flag to enable ot disable stock check in app
Geolocation Api endpoint used to retrieve the location information in bopis search
This property defines the type of gift card that should be allowed
This settings hides the rating for products across the site
This setting defines how inventory levels are calculated
This setting defines displays which inventory ranges are displayed on the site, only applicable if Total Available or Physical Available are selected
Limit to the number of copies of an item that can be added to a cart line
Active when Inventory Buffer is selected. Threshold to use when determining if a product is out of stock or not -- if its less than or equal to this value, it'll be marked as out of stock

friendlyName.value: Inventory settings for product list pages.

description.value: This setting defines how out of stock products should be displayed in product lists such as Product Collection and Search results modules.
Maximum number of characters for the review text
Maximum number of characters for the title
Privacy Policy for Ratings and Reviews
Maximum number of characters for the search input field

This setting streamlines payment authorization by making a single request that includes a request for tokenization and an authorization for the amount due. When enabled, the payment module must be placed as the last step in checkout prior to place order.

This setting enables the new image logic which shows a placeholder image and low resolution images while the actual image is loading. This can be overridden on the module by setting “Disable lazy load” to true.

friendlyName.value: Display unit of measure for products

description.value: This setting defines the display of unit of measure for a product
This setting defines if inventory  should be calculated based on individual warehouse or if it should an aggregate of  the applicable warehouses.
Feature module used to highlight a product.
Sets the desired alignment of the image, either left or right on the text.
Rich text representing the featured product details
Text to show on the call to action button

Background color is used for page and module background such as buybox, carousel, cart etc.
Brand accent is the accent color used to represent the brand. Its typically used on primary buttons.

friendlyName.value: Brand accent alt on hover state

description.value: Brand accent alt is the color used to represent the brand on hover state. Its typically used on primary buttons on hover.
Secondary button on hover state. Its typically used on secondary buttons on hover.
Text default is the default color used for text.
Text accent is the accent color for text used in combination with brand accent.

Modal background is used for modals as background color.
Modal text is used as the color for text on the modals.
